suppress.notes: file name: commons-io-2.4.jar. PrimeFaces shades this JAR and does not use the function in this report.
file name: url-regex:5.0.0 PrimeFaces uses this from FullCalendar.io but it is a transitive build dependency.
file name: guava.jar PrimeFaces does not use the temp directory functionality that is vulnerable
file name: jdom2.jar Unit test proving we don't use this functionality https://github.com/primefaces/primefaces/pull/7513
file name: javaee-api-8.0-5.jar Tomee 8.0.9 fixes this issue but marking as OK for now since this is a provided dependency.
